description: Erection of a rear dormer roof extension; erection of a single storey extension to the side of the main building following the removal of the existing shed; erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side and rear of the existing back addition following the demolition of the existing single storey side extension; installation of an enlarged rooflight to replace existing rooflight to the rear roofslope; installation of a rooflight to the side roofslope of the existing two storey back addition (all as approved under planning permission reference: 2024/00446/FUL); amendments to approved rear dormer roof extension with alterations to a rear mansard roof extension with 3no. dormers with timber framed sash windows, and raising of the parapet walls; fenestration detail to approved rear extension updated to Crittal type glazing; and brick type to approved rear extension/side return updated from Petersen Tegl D71 to London stock to match existing.
decision_conditions: No other alterations to exterior of bldg
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
